data.title: Close with the Smoke - Sauced to Death
data.text:
My Mom used to say if your hungry enough its good, but I was so looking forward to this place and It just isn't a place I could recommend.   

We got the brisket sandwich and pork ribs.

Pork Ribs:
It is like they are going after a honey bbq sauce and I'm just not a fan.  I want a vinegar base (would also accept brown sugar base for sweet) and really like my dry rub and smoke to come through the sauce but there not letting the smoked meat come through. it was just to sweet and overpowering of the beautiful idea of a smoked piece of pork.  The size was great.

Brisket Sandwich:
SO CLOSE - but I don't know if they have tried to eat their sandwiches but the way that they are currently building the sliders is destroying the bottom bun and you can't pick it up and eat it.   

Service and friendliness was there! 10/10

The recommendation for the slaw and the baked beans was spot on, but I was bummed that it was the best part.
